problem: What is the minimum value of possible values for $x$ if $|3x + 1| \leq 8$?
solution: First, solve the inequality $|3x + 1| \leq 8$. This expands to $-8 \leq 3x + 1 \leq 8$. Subtracting 1 from all parts gives $-9 \leq 3x \leq 7$. Dividing everything by 3 results in $-3 \leq x \leq \frac{7}{3}$. Thus, the minimum value of $x$ is $\boxed{-3}$.
